summary: During the 1970s, a NYC magazine reporter investigates to see who benefits financially the most from New York's prostitution industry.
cast: Lee Remick|Monte Markham|Jill Clayburgh|Alex Rocco|Melanie Mayron|Beverly Hope Atkinson|Dick O'Neill|Burt Young|Paul Benedict|John Sylvester White|Allan Miller|Burke Byrnes|James Andronica|Howard Hesseman|Clifford A. Pellow|Stephen Nathan|Alex Colon|Richard Keith|Lisa Daniels|Bernie McInerney|Kathryn Janssen|Lauren Simon|Tim Thomerson|Garry Walberg
title: Hustling
